Text:
Can you please give me a quick info on how to change the backrounds on a 1.5 psp? was looking around and didnt realy find anything that worked good :)

Thanks in advance

In 1.5 u cant get own backgrounds!

If ur not using homebrew u should update to 2.0 or higher so u CAN use ur own backgrounds.....

Pfft.. who wanna give up the chance to play ripped games and homebrews for that? 
any1 know of any homebrew that allow you to change the backgrounds?

you can change backgrounds on 1.5 it is very easy use PSPersonalize v1.0 

http://www.psp-hacks.com/psp-backgrounds.php
